Package views.screen

Class BikeInformationScreenHandler

java.lang.Object
views.screen.EcoBikeBaseScreenHandler
views.screen.BikeInformationScreenHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class BikeInformationScreenHandler
extends EcoBikeBaseScreenHandler
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
This class creates a handler for getting customer's behaviors on the bike information screen
Author:
chauntm

  • Method Details

    • getBikeInformationScreenHandler

      public static BikeInformationScreenHandler getBikeInformationScreenHandler​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, EcoBikeBaseScreenHandler prevScreen, Bike bike)
      This class return an instance of bike information screen handler, initialize it with the stage, prevScreen and bike
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage to show this screen
      prevScreen - the screen that call to this screen
      bike - the bike to render this screen, provide null if update is not needed
